This is an R interface of [tumopp](https://github.com/heavywatal/tumopp),
a tumor growth simulator in C++.

```{r run}
library(tidyverse)
library(tumopp)
result = tumopp("-D2 -Chex -k100") %>% print()
result$population[[1L]]
```
